1. import java.sql.* package
2.Class.forName("com.mysql.jdbc.driver")
3. Connection con =DriverMangaer.get Connection("URL", "UN","PW");
4. Statement st= com.createStatement();
5. ResultSet rs = st.executeQuery("select * from studentsData_t")
6. while(rs.next())
   {
     sysout(rs.getInt()+" "+ rs.getString());
   }
7.st.close();
  con.close();








import java.sql.*;

public class DemoClass {

	public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		       // String driver="com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver";
		        String url="jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/sql_invoicing";
				String uname="root";
				String pwd="likitha@4855*";
				//System.setProperty(driver, " ");
				String query="select * from clients where client_id=3";
Class.forName("com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver");
Connection con =DriverManager.getConnection(url,uname,pwd);
Statement st=con.createStatement();
ResultSet rs=st.executeQuery(query);	
rs.next();
String name=rs.getString("name");
System.out.println(name);
/*while(rs.next())
	{
	String name=rs.getString("name");
	String add=rs.getString("address");
	String cty=rs.getString("city");
	String ste=rs.getString("state");
	int pne=rs.getInt("phone");
	System.out.println(name);
	/*System.out.println(add);
	System.out.println(cty);
	System.out.println(ste);
	System.out.println(pne);
	}*/

st.close();
con.close();
}

}
